alert.note: Alert for Clark (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 2:53PM CDT until March 13 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Band of Moderate to Heavy Snow over Central Wisconsin... .A band of moderate to even heavy snow lingers over central Wisconsin into this evening and may produce a total of 3 to 6 inches of snow before weakening later this evening. Given the potential for snowfall rates in excess of 1 inch per hour, roadways may become snow covered and slick. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Clark County, with the highest snow amounts likely concentrated in the northern part of the county. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
